page.title: 02EAST LINTON LISTED BUILDINGS
page.content:
East Linton has many buildings of historical interest, Preston Mill being the most well known. The following list shows all the houses which are of historical value.
Seventeenth Century House. Bridgend House. Eighteenth Century Houses. 10,Bridge Street. Linton Cottage, Bridge Street. 23,Bank Road. 3,Mill Wynd. 4, Mill Wynd. 6,Mill Wynd. The Square. High Street, numbers 8,9,25,29,30,32,43,44,45,47,52,65,71. Crown Hotel,Bridge Street. 1,Langside. 9,Brown's Place. Nineteenth Century Houses. Bridgend. 52,High Street. 15,High Street.
